extName.description: The name of the extension displayed in Chrome

extDescription.message: Always see and copy your ChatGPT conversation title. Configurable click shortcuts for different copy formats.
extDescription.description: The description of the extension displayed in Chrome Web Store

optionsCopyShortcuts.description: Heading for the copy shortcuts section in options

optionsFeedback.description: Heading for the feedback section in options

shortcutCmd.description: Label for the command/control modifier (shows Cmd on Mac)

shortcutCtrl.description: Label for the control modifier (shows Ctrl on Windows/Linux)

formatMarkdown.description: Option label for markdown link format

formatTitle.description: Option label for title only format

formatFull.description: Option label for full context format (project + title)

formatUrl.description: Option label for URL only format

statusSaved.description: Status message shown when preferences are saved

optionsFooter.message: Changes apply immediately to all ChatGPT tabs.

optionsPlaySound.description: Label for the audio feedback toggle

tooltipFull.description: Abbreviation for full context in tooltip

ariaClickToCopy.description: Accessibility label for the title element
